channel.title: How do I make NPC agressive?
channel.description: On my last server, I already had agression, jsut had to add in the npc ID's, but since i changed sources, they arent agressive, how do I add this in? The tutorials in section suck, and don't work lolz, if some1 can help me I will post a full tutorial on how to do it, for every1 else to see also...

item.title: How do I make NPC agressive?
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

I would recommend searching the JAD npcid then copy the stuff you need and replace the npcid with whatever npc you want… the reason is because on almost all servers the JAD IS AGGRESIVE GL!!!

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make NPC agressive?
item.dc:creator: @zach14411 zach1441!
item.description:
@zach14411 wrote:

to make a npc agessive open npchandler
and search for

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)

and under the last } in it add this

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
  client person = (client)p;
 if(p != null && person != null)
{
   if(p != null && person != null)
{
     if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel)
     if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE || npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE)
    npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
    npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
    npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel)
     if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE || npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE)
{
    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}

and add all the npc ids there that you want to be agressive if you want more just add another || npcs[i].npcType =

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make NPC agressive?
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

uhh… its very hard. almost no servers have agressive monsters. id suggest just not making them aggressive[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 05:30:42 PM[/size][hr]and you cant make them to stop attacking people once they get to a certain combat level, (thats a wholee nother thing) so like chickens would still be attacking level 185’s. (just for example. iknow you can change what monsters attack)
